dcterms:creator: A.L. Maas
R.E. Daly
P.T. Pham
D. Huang
A.Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 50,000 movie reviews labeled as having either positive or negative sentiment, with an equal number of positive and negative reviews. Each review has a sentiment polarity score of either ≤4 or ≥7 on a polarity index of 10.
dcterms:title: IMDB Movie Reviews Dataset

dcterms:description: An unsupervised lexicon-based model used for sentiment analysis, utilizing a curated lexicon to derive sentiment scores from text.
dcterms:title: Sent WordNet
